definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: And so, at six in the morning, a victorious Convention adjourns .
sentences.chinese: 这样，早上六点，胜利的国民议会休会了。

sentences.english: Malian National Assembly president to visit China.
sentences.chinese: 马里国民议会议长即将访问中国。

sentences.english: The National Assembly constitutionally should be elected every five years for a five year term.
sentences.chinese: 国民议会本质上每五年需要选举一次。

sentences.english: The South African parliament is composed of the National Assembly and the National Council of Provinces.
sentences.chinese: 南非议会由国民议会和全国省级事务委员会组成。

sentences.english: A unicameral National Assembly to exercise legislative power.
sentences.chinese: 国民议会为一院制，行使立法权。

sentences.english: Patricia Foxen is the associate director of research at the National Council of La Raza.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里夏福克斯是研究在国民议会的La拉扎副主任。

sentences.english: Afghanistan has a democratically-elected President and National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗拥有民选总统和国民议会。

definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
seat in a parliament or legislative assembly
African National Congress, ANC/abbr. for 非洲人國民大會|非洲人国民大会[Fei1 zhou1 ren2 guo2 min2 da4 hui4]
